sections.heading: (1)As used in this chapter, the term “judicial office” includes the office of:(a)Justice of the Supreme Court
sections.text: (b)Judge of a district court of appeal.(c)Judge of a circuit court.(d)County court judge.(2)A judicial office is a nonpartisan office, and a candidate for election or retention thereto is pr
